Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 29th overall pick, by California in 1983...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1987, off Bryn Smith (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/20/1987, off Joe Sambito (MIN)...
Had 6 hits with 4 RBI against Minnesota on 4/5/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1990, hitting .448 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1991...
Injured on 8/28/1992 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/24/1993 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
